name: Bitdungeong
description:
bit dungeon game when you need to conquer your inner demons with music!

shoot = its shoots automatic according to your bitboard!

movement = w a s d and mouse position 

dash = left shift

ty for

assets we use  Nature Starter Kit 1 in the unity asset store
